description:
Rating 2
I really cannot give it a good rating as it has regressed from version 2.9x. I cannot open my old kexi files which is a frustration as well as a waste of time trying to figure out what has changed. That's where MS unfortunately will always have the upper hand... compatibility.

I like KEXI because it has many similarities to Microsoft Access. You can even import data or tables from a Microsoft Access (.mdb) database. But KEXI comes with a couple of disappointments: 1) there is no way you can import just a single table from an .mdb database. It's all or none. 2) If you created a KEXI database and spent hours building forms, you will lose forms the next time your to import the same .mdb database with more updated information. Other than, I like KEXI
la encuentro inestable. Interfaz gráfica interesante pero no conseguí hacer nada estable.
